actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to protect breastfeeding by new mothers.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Pregnancy Discrimination Act Amendments of 2000 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to include breast-feeding (including expression of milk by a lactating woman) within the definitions of "because of sex" or "on the basis of sex" for purposes of the discrimination prohibitions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to protect breastfeeding by new mothers.
